Diagnosis.question: Have you been diagnosed with any of the following conditions?

Symptom Severity (1-10).question: On a scale of 1 to 10, how severe are your symptoms currently? (1 = No symptoms, 10 = Extremely severe)

Mood Score (1-10).question: On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your overall mood today? (1 = Very bad, 10 = Excellent)

Sleep Quality (1-10).question: On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate the quality of your sleep recently? (1 = Very poor, 10 = Excellent)

Physical Activity (hrs/week).question: How many hours of physical activity or exercise do you do in a typical week?

Medication.question: Are you currently taking any of the following medications?

Therapy Type.question: Are you undergoing any of the following therapy types?

Treatment Duration (weeks).question: How many weeks has your current treatment been ongoing?

Stress Level (1-10).question: On a scale of 1 to 10, how stressed are you feeling currently? (1 = No stress, 10 = Extremely stressed)

Outcome.question: How would you describe the outcome of your current treatment so far?

Treatment Progress (1-10).question: On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your progress in treatment? (1 = No progress, 10 = Excellent progress)

AI-Detected Emotional State.question: How would you describe your current emotional state?

Adherence to Treatment (%).question: What percentage of your prescribed treatment plan (e.g., medication, therapy) do you adhere to regularly? (Answer in percentage)
